entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-30
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [XC] Consider compiling the OnIdiomExtension into OnIdiom<T> #22142
  • The rapid response of DragGesture Recognizer. #22141
  • I have some problems with dependencies #22140
  • [android] Identified crash in toolbar extensions when using a custom image source #22138
  • Switch.Toggled Triggering & Binding Problems #22137
  • [iOS] Splash and app icon doesn't work on a real device #22136
  • Vertical Scrolling in ScrollView Orientation = "BOTH" is not working [Android] #22133
  • App crashes when navigating from TabbedPage to another TabbedPage #22131
    Backlog
  • Label text overlap in HorizontalStackLayout #22130

Closed

  • Nuget connectivity/ Android Device manager connectivity #19537
  • How to use Android's jar? And there are armeabi v7a dependencies on so files. #22129
  • Picker Crash App on iOS Simulation #21972

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] SemanticProperties.HeadingLevel not working in ListView #21830 #22135
    platform/android 🤖, area/a11y, community ✨

Updated

  • Update NavigatedFromEventArgs.cs #21754
    area/navigation 🧭, community ✨
  • [iOS] Apply contentInsets for any entry/editor in a scrollview #21807
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, layout-scrollview
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Core on Tizen #21925
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Trimming] Enable analyzers in Controls.Xaml #21927
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Android] Flyout Page support for IconImageSource #22099
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-flyout
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView - fix #22107
    platform/android 🤖, area/collectionview 📃, community ✨
  • Add .NET MAUI Blazor Hybrid + Web App solution template #21867
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • [iOS] Shell/NavigationPage TitleView #20959
    area/shell 🐢, community ✨, control-titleview
  • [Span] Improve formatting inheritance #21191
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [android] fix one layer of "overdraw" by default #22126
    platform/android 🤖, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add support for running Appium tests with BrowserStack #18312
    area/testing, stale
  • Binding source generator #21725
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Fix performance issue using Shadows #18337
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Android] DatePicker Focus and Unfocus events #20547
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
